name: Eating
description: Consuming food and drink for sustenance and enjoyment

srdReferences.quote: perform no more than 2 hours of light activity, such as reading, talking, eating, or standing watch
For each of those days that you spend resting and doing nothing more than light activity, your remaining recovery time decreases by 2 days
A character needs one pound of food per day
srdReferences.context: Food and water requirements for survival

examples: Sharing a meal at an inn's common room
Consuming trail rations during a short rest

downtimeUses.name: Feasting
downtimeUses.description: Participating in elaborate meals for social or political purposes
downtimeUses.socialBenefits: Building relationships with nobility or important figures

downtimeUses.name: Daily Sustenance
downtimeUses.cost: 5 sp per day (modest lifestyle) to 4 gp per day (wealthy lifestyle)

survivalRequirements.note: Characters can go without food for 3 + Constitution modifier days (minimum 1) before suffering exhaustion. Characters can survive half as many days without water.
